title: Appointments for the Posts of Additional Secretary in the Prime Minister's	Office
decision_details:
- The proposals made by the Hon. Prime Minister to make the following appointments for 02 vacancies existing in the Posts of Additional Secretary in the Prime Minister's Office, were approved by the Cabinet. 

	  * 	   Appointment of Mr. J.M.I.R.K. Jayasundara, Special Grade Officer of	   the Sri Lanka Administrative Service, presently serving as an Additional 	  District Secretary in the Kurunegala District Secretariat, to a post of	   Additional Secretary in the Prime Minister's Office. 

		* 	Appointment of Ms. Chandani Sagarika Bogahawatta, Grade I	Officer  				of the Sri Lanka Planning Service, presently serving as a Director in the				Department of Project Management and Monitoring of	the Ministry of				Finance, Planning and Economic Development, to act full time in a post of 					Additional Secretary in the Prime Minister's Office.
